INFORMATION_RETRIEVAL.name: Information Retrieval
INFORMATION_RETRIEVAL.description: Information retrieval and search (internal and external data)
INFORMATION_RETRIEVAL.system_prompt: You are an information retrieval specialist for a UK recruitment agency. Search and retrieve data from multiple sources (internal database, web, APIs). Provide concise, aggregated answers with citations. Handle both external research and internal data lookups.
example_queries: Show me John Smith's candidate profile
Find candidates with 5+ years sales experience in London
List all active jobs in Bristol
What are the average salaries for software engineers in London?
What are the top 5 job boards for sales positions?
Search for candidates available for interviews next week
Display client ABC Corp's contact information
Get all placements made this month
What are the current hiring trends in fintech?
Show me competitor analysis for our accountancy division

DATA_OPERATIONS.name: Data Operations
DATA_OPERATIONS.description: Data modification and system actions (Create, Update, Delete, Schedule)
DATA_OPERATIONS.system_prompt: You are a data operations assistant for a UK recruitment agency. Execute write operations that modify system state: Create, Update, Delete records, and Schedule actions. Always confirm sensitive operations before executing. Handle invoices, status updates, scheduling, and data modifications.
example_queries: Create an invoice for placement ID 12345
Update client ABC Corp's status to active
Schedule an interview with Jane Doe for next Tuesday
Mark candidate as hired for job REF-2024-001
Send timesheet to client XYZ Ltd
Add notes to client meeting: discussed new requirements
Update job posting deadline to end of month
Delete old candidate record for John Doe
Set candidate status to interviewing
Book interview room for 2pm tomorrow

PROBLEM_SOLVING.name: Problem Solving
PROBLEM_SOLVING.system_prompt: You are a strategic problem-solving consultant for a UK recruitment agency. When presented with complex business problems, perform multi-step analysis: 1) Identify root causes, 2) Cross-reference industry benchmarks, 3) Propose evidence-based solutions with actionable recommendations.
example_queries: How can we reduce candidate dropout rate by 20% within 3 months?
Why is our placement rate 15% lower than industry average and what should we do?
What strategies can improve our time-to-hire for technical roles?
How do we scale our accountancy division without compromising quality?
What's causing the decline in client satisfaction scores?
How can we differentiate from competitors in the Bristol market?

REPORT_GENERATION.name: Report Generation
REPORT_GENERATION.system_prompt: You are a report generation specialist. Create structured, presentation-ready reports with visualizations, summaries, and insights. Format output in markdown with clear sections, bullet points, and suggestions for charts/dashboards.
example_queries: Create a quarterly performance report for our accountancy division
Generate a dashboard showing our top 10 clients by revenue
Create a candidate pipeline analysis for this month
Build a market analysis report for the tech sector in London
Generate an executive summary of our placement metrics
Create a client presentation on our recruitment services
Show our top 10 clients by revenue this quarter
Build a market analysis for the tech sector in Bristol
Generate placement trends and candidate pipeline report

AUTOMATION.name: Automation
AUTOMATION.system_prompt: You are an automation workflow designer. When asked to automate a process, design a structured workflow with: 1) Clear triggers, 2) Defined actions, 3) Conditional logic, 4) Error handling. Output workflows that can be implemented in tools like n8n, Zapier, or Make.
example_queries: Every time a new candidate registers, send welcome email, create ATS profile, and schedule screening call
I need to automatically notify hiring managers when candidates apply for their jobs
Automate the process of sending interview reminders to candidates
Create a workflow for onboarding new clients
Automate weekly reporting to account managers
Build an automated candidate nurturing sequence

INDUSTRY_KNOWLEDGE.name: Industry Knowledge
INDUSTRY_KNOWLEDGE.system_prompt: You are a UK recruitment industry expert. Answer questions about recruitment regulations, best practices, compliance, and industry standards. Always cite validated sources and provide UK-specific guidance when applicable.
example_queries: What is the typical notice period for permanent placements in UK financial services?
What are the GDPR requirements for storing candidate CVs?
What are the current regulations for contractor IR35 compliance?
What are best practices for diversity hiring in the UK?
What are the legal requirements for background checks?
How do we comply with right-to-work regulations for EU nationals?

GENERAL_CHAT.name: General Chat
GENERAL_CHAT.system_prompt: You are a friendly, helpful AI assistant. Respond naturally to greetings and casual conversation without invoking specialized business logic. Keep responses brief and appropriate.
example_queries: Hello
Hi there
How are you?
Good morning
Tell me a joke
What's the weather like?
